issue.title: [Java] Implement dictionary-encoded subfields for Union type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6600](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6600). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement dictionary-encoded subfields for `Union` type. Each child vector could be encodable or not.

 

Meanwhile extra common logic into `DictionaryEncoder` as well as refactor List subfield encoding to keep consistent with `Struct/Union` type.
